table.title: Number of computers on which this file has been created:

search.query: `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* `FileCreatedOps` [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | table FileHash] | top 0 FileName showperc=false | rename FileName as "File Name", count as Computers
`$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | dedup FileHash | table Md5, Sha1, FileHash | rename Md5 AS MD5, Sha1 AS "SHA-1", FileHash AS "SHA-256"

table.title: File Information: First Seen On Network

search.query: `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p" mktime(ModifiedDate) AS ModifiedCTime | sort ModifiedCTime | table FileName, Timestamp, PathName, Publisher, HostName, TrustValue, FileSize | stats first(FileName) as "File Name" first(Timestamp) as "Date Created" first(PathName) as "First Path" first(Publisher) as Publisher first(HostName) as "First Computer" last(TrustValue) as "Trust" first(FileSize) as "File Size"

`cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* `FileActivityOps` [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | table FileHash] | append [search `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* `FileActivityOps` [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | eval ProcessHash=FileHash | table ProcessHash]] | timechart bins=50 count(eval(`$hashTestOut$($hashToken$)` AND OpType=0)) as "Got created", count(eval(`$notHashTestOut$($hashToken$)` AND OpType=0)) as "Created another file", count(eval(`$hashTestOut$($hashToken$)` AND OpType!=0)) as "Got modified", count(eval(`$notHashTestOut$($hashToken$)` AND OpType!=0)) as "Modified another file"

`cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` latest=now earliest=1 | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p" mktime(ModifiedDate) AS ModifiedCTime | sort ModifiedCTime | head 1 | table FileName] | dedup FileHash, HostName | table FileHash, HostName | rename FileHash as Hash, HostName as Computer

`cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* `FilesModifiedOps` [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | eval ProcessHash=FileHash | table ProcessHash] | table Timestamp, HostName, FileName, OpDescription | sort Timestamp | rename HostName as Computer, FileName as Name, OpDescription as Operation

table.title: Top Hashes Modified By This File

search.query: `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*NetTrace* `FilesModifiedOps` [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | eval ProcessHash=FileHash | table ProcessHash] | top showperc=false 0 FileHash, FileName | sort -count | rename FileHash as Hash, FileName as Name, count as Count

table.title: Top Event Subtypes Containing This File

search.query: `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*Event* [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | table FileHash] | append maxtime=180 [search `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*Event* [search `HashSearch($hashToken$)` | eval ProcessHash=FileHash | table ProcessHash]] | top 0 EventSubType showperc=false | rename EventSubType as "Event Subtype", count as Count

`cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*Event* RuleName!="" [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | table FileHash] | append maxtime=180 [search `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*Event* RuleName!="" [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | eval ProcessHash=FileHash | table ProcessHash]] | append maxtime=180 [search `cb_index` sourcetype=bit9 source=*Event* RuleName!="" [search `$hashTermOut$($hashToken$)` | eval InstallerHash=FileHash | table InstallerHash]] | top 0 RuleName
